readable.title: 2934801096_230ae78d7e
readable.content: A man and a boy standing in front of a sign that says " HELL " . Two males on a street corner crooswalk with a billboard behind them . Two males stand by a board that says HELL . Two people stand next to a sign that says " HELL " made out of stars . Two young men , one smoking , walk past a large sign that uses orange stars to spell " HELL " .
